text: The metric (??) in real variables reads  (2.5) The coframe of one-forms becomes (2.6)with the metric (2.7) 3 Bi-Hamiltonian representations of CMA system The system (??) can be put in the Hamiltonian form (3.1) where and are Euler-Lagrange operators [?] with respect to and  Here is the Hamiltonian operator (3.2)determining the structure of Poisson bracket and is the correspondingHamiltonian density (3.3)The first real recursion operator has the form (3.4) 4
maths: <math id="S2.Ex3.m3" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\displaystyle{\rm d}s^{2}=(v_{t}+u_{xx})({\rm d}t^{2}+{\rm d}x^{2})+\Delta(u)(%{\rm d}y^{2}+{\rm d}z^{2})" display="inline"><mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>t</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>u</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>u</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mi>z</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></math>

<math id="S2.E5.m3" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\displaystyle\mbox{}-2b({\rm d}t\,{\rm d}z-{\rm d}x\,{\rm d}y)+2c({\rm d}t\,{%\rm d}y+{\rm d}x\,{\rm d}z)." display="inline"><mrow><mrow><mrow><mrow/><mo>-</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mpadded width="+1.7pt"><mi>t</mi></mpadded><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>z</mi></mrow><mo>-</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mpadded width="+1.7pt"><mi>x</mi></mpadded><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mpadded width="+1.7pt"><mi>t</mi></mpadded><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mpadded width="+1.7pt"><mi>x</mi></mpadded><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>z</mi></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>.</mo></mrow></math>

<math id="S2.Ex4.m3" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\displaystyle\Omega_{1}=\frac{1}{2\sqrt{v_{t}+u_{xx}}}[(c+ib)({\rm d}y+i{\rm d%}z)+(v_{t}+u_{xx})({\rm d}t+i{\rm d}x)]" display="inline"><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>⁢</mo><msqrt><mrow><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>t</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>u</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mstyle><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mi>c</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mi>i</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mi>i</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>z</mi></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>t</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>u</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mi>i</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></math>

<math id="S2.E6.m3" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\displaystyle\Omega_{2}=\bar{\Omega}_{1},\quad\Omega_{3}=\frac{{\rm d}y+i{\rm d%}z}{2\sqrt{v_{t}+u_{xx}}},\quad\Omega_{4}=\bar{\Omega}_{3}" display="inline"><mrow><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mover accent="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mo rspace="12.5pt">,</mo><mrow><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mi>i</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>z</mi></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>⁢</mo><msqrt><mrow><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>t</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>u</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></mrow><mo rspace="12.5pt">,</mo><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mover accent="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow></mrow></mrow></math>

<math id="S2.E7.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="{\rm d}s^{2}=\Omega_{1}\otimes\bar{\Omega}_{1}+\varepsilon\,\Omega_{2}\otimes%\bar{\Omega}_{2}." display="block"><mrow><mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>⊗</mo><msub><mover accent="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mrow><mpadded width="+1.7pt"><mi>ε</mi></mpadded><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mo>⊗</mo><msub><mover accent="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>.</mo></mrow></math>
The system (??) can be put in the Hamiltonian form
<math id="S3.p1.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="CMA" display="inline"><mrow><mi>C</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>M</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>A</mi></mrow></math>

<math id="S3.E1.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\left(\begin{array}[]{c}u_{t}\\v_{t}\end{array}\right)=J_{0}\left(\begin{array}[]{c}\delta_{u}H_{1}\\\delta_{v}H_{1}\end{array}\right)" display="block"><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable displaystyle="true" rowspacing="0pt"><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><msub><mi>u</mi><mi>t</mi></msub></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>t</mi></msub></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><msub><mi>J</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable displaystyle="true" rowspacing="0pt"><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><msub><mi>δ</mi><mi>u</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><msub><mi>δ</mi><mi>v</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></math>
where and are Euler-Lagrange operators [?] with respect to and
<math id="S3.p1.m2" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\delta_{u}" display="inline"><msub><mi>δ</mi><mi>u</mi></msub></math>
<math id="S3.p1.m3" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\delta_{v}" display="inline"><msub><mi>δ</mi><mi>v</mi></msub></math>
<math id="S3.p1.m4" class="ltx_Math" alttext="u" display="inline"><mi>u</mi></math>
<math id="S3.p1.m5" class="ltx_Math" alttext="v" display="inline"><mi>v</mi></math>
Here is the Hamiltonian operator
<math id="S3.p1.m6" class="ltx_Math" alttext="J_{0}" display="inline"><msub><mi>J</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>

<math id="S3.E2.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="J_{0}=\left(\begin{array}[]{cc}\phantom{-}0&\hskip 5.690551pt\frac{\textstyle 1%}{\textstyle a}\\-\frac{\textstyle 1}{\textstyle a}&\hskip 5.690551pt\frac{\textstyle 1}{%\textstyle a}(cD_{y}+D_{y}c-bD_{z}-D_{z}b)\frac{\textstyle 1}{\textstyle a}%\end{array}\right)" display="block"><mrow><msub><mi>J</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable columnspacing="5pt" displaystyle="true" rowspacing="0pt"><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="center"><mpadded lspace="5.7pt" width="+5.7pt"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>a</mi></mfrac></mpadded></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>a</mi></mfrac></mrow></mtd><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><mpadded lspace="5.7pt" width="+5.7pt"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>a</mi></mfrac></mpadded><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>y</mi></msub></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>y</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mi>c</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>-</mo><mrow><mi>b</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>z</mi></msub></mrow><mo>-</mo><mrow><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>z</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>⁢</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>a</mi></mfrac></mrow></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>
determining the structure of Poisson bracket and is the corresponding
<math id="S3.p1.m7" class="ltx_Math" alttext="H_{1}" display="inline"><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

<math id="S3.E3.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="H_{1}=\frac{1}{2}\,[v^{2}\Delta(u)-u_{xx}(u_{y}^{2}+u_{z}^{2})]-\varepsilon u." display="block"><mrow><mrow><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mrow><mpadded width="+1.7pt"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mpadded><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mrow><mrow><msup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>u</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>-</mo><mrow><msub><mi>u</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><msubsup><mi>u</mi><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>+</mo><msubsup><mi>u</mi><mi>z</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>-</mo><mrow><mi>ε</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>u</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>.</mo></mrow></math>

<math id="S3.E4.m3" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\displaystyle R_{1}=\left(\begin{array}[]{cr}0&0\\QD_{z}-cD_{x}&b\end{array}\right)+" display="inline"><mrow><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable columnspacing="5pt" rowspacing="0pt"><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="right"><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><mrow><mrow><mi>Q</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>z</mi></msub></mrow><mo>-</mo><mrow><mi>c</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>x</mi></msub></mrow></mrow></mtd><mtd columnalign="right"><mi>b</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

<math id="S3.Ex5.m3" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\displaystyle\Delta^{-1}\!\left(\begin{array}[]{cc}D_{y}\Bigl{(}-aD_{x}+bD_{y}%+cD_{z}\Bigr{)}+D_{z}\Bigl{(}cD_{y}-bD_{z}\Bigr{)}&-D_{z}a\\\begin{array}[]{l}D_{x}\Bigl{[}D_{y}\Bigl{(}cD_{y}-bD_{z}\Bigr{)}+D_{z}\Bigl{(%}aD_{x}-bD_{y}-cD_{z}\Bigr{)}\Bigr{]}\end{array}&-D_{x}D_{y}a\end{array}\right)"
